name: Hue City with Cyclo Experience
description:
Morning: our Cyclo team will pick you up from your hotel and take a circle tour around Imperial city. Check out at the central Flag tower, then take a walking tour to discover Imperial & Forbidden city with: South Gate, Thai Hoa Harmony Supreme, the Royal Theater, The Mieu Temple, Nine Dynasty Urns…Continue with Cyclo tour to Thien Mu Pagoda (namely Heaven Fairy Lady Pagoda), also known as Linh Mu Pagoda, is one of the most fascinating and ancient pagoda in Hue city. Return to the city by Dragon boat trip before transferring to Local restaurant for having lunch. 

Afternoon:  this afternoon tour will gives you a deep understanding about King’s philosophy of geomancy and how this affected royal life. Visit tomb of Emperor Tu Duc - not only one of the most beautiful works of the Nguyen dynasty, but it is also romantic scenery of mounts and lakes. After that Continue to visit Khai Đinh's tomb, the tomb has many elements of Western architecture. In fact, of all the tombs, Khai Dinh's probably least resembles oriental architecture. The tour finished at your hotel.
